text.name: information_Motor
text.text: Maintenance required in: %1.1f engine hours or %1.0f day(s)

text.name: information_wartung
text.text: Maintenance completed in %1.0f hours and %1.0f minutes

text.name: function_Pallet
text.text: This pallet is used for the maintenance of your vehicles. Maintenance prices: 25.000,- 20.000,- 16.000,- 12.000,- 8.000,-

text.name: warning_moneyChange
text.text: Maintenance is being executed and will be completed in %1.0f hour(s). The price for this maintenance is %1.0f,- and will be charged to your account.
